description: Substitute single key commands for arrow keys to scroll through headings, links, etc. so that you can do everything with one hand.

translations.description: Sustituye los comandos de una sola tecla por las flechas para desplazarse por los encabezados, enlaces, etc., de modo que pueda hacerlo todo con una mano.
Substitute single key commands for arrow keys to scroll through headings, links, etc. so that you can do everything with one hand.
Substitute single key commands for arrow keys to scroll through headings, links, etc. so that you can do everything with one hand.
Tek harf navigasyonunun sadece yön tuşlarıyla yapılmasına olanak tanır, böylece başlıklar, bağlantılar, form alanları vb arasında yalnızca tek elinizi kullanarak kolayca gezinebilirsiniz.
Substitute single key commands for arrow keys to scroll through headings, links, etc. so that you can do everything with one hand.
用方向鍵代替單鍵導航，更容易跳轉到下一個標題、連結等。您可以用單手完成所有操作。
